DataElement.preferredName: Lost To Follow-up Status Cancel Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the patient's report of lost to follow-up was withdrawn represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Lost To Follow-up Status Cancel
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._The loss or lack of continuation of subject participation after a study has officially closed._A condition or state at a particular time._Postpone indefinitely or annul something that was scheduled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3787414 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
